mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reference to marijuana; response to "NUGZ" with "HUGZ". One graffiti responds to another that is not visible. Possible reference to rapper Bobby Shmurda. Quote from TV commercials urging people to buy gold. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
